solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int[] intersect(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {--newline--        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<Integer, Integer>();--newline--        ArrayList<Integer> result = new ArrayList<Integer>();--newline--        for(int i = 0; i < nums1.length; i++)--newline--        {--newline--            if(map.containsKey(nums1[i])) map.put(nums1[i], map.get(nums1[i])+1);--newline--            else map.put(nums1[i], 1);--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--        for(int i = 0; i < nums2.length; i++)--newline--        {--newline--            if(map.containsKey(nums2[i]) && map.get(nums2[i]) > 0)--newline--            {--newline--                result.add(nums2[i]);--newline--                map.put(nums2[i], map.get(nums2[i])-1);--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--       int[] r = new int[result.size()];--newline--       for(int i = 0; i < result.size(); i++)--newline--       {--newline--           r[i] = result.get(i);--newline--       }--newline--    --newline--       return r;--newline--    }--newline--}
